title: 38 - Sidebar Nation
description: It’s My Favorite Murder, this week with hand-holding and shit! Karen and Georgia share the story of the killer priest, Gerald Robinson, and prepare for their trip to Chicago with a breakdown of the 2016 Gage Park stabbings.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
